dialog.text: I'm sorry, but I don't think I can go on fighting now. I need time alone.

We're too late. ~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~ This is the last spot I saw my wife and children, and now they're gone forever. Why couldn't there have been reinforcements? ~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~ Moroni, I'm sorry, but I don't think I can go on fighting now. I need time alone.

ai_sprite.name: villager2
ai_sprite.dialog: The man who lived here had fled to Sidom to the west a while back. Someone should probably let him know his house is burned down.

ai_sprite.name: yuppie
ai_sprite.dialog: The Lamanites destroyed the city of Ammonihah and all its inhabitants. I hope I can find a way to rebuild this palace without starting from scratch.
